name: Pizza
description: Cheesy and delicious with a crispy crust and topped with fresh ingredients like tomatoes, olives, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Burger
description: Juicy and satisfying beef patty served with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and a special sauce on a toasted sesame bun.

name: Sushi
description: Fresh and healthy sushi rolls made with premium-grade fish, sticky rice, and wrapped in seaweed.

name: Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with a rich garlic and Parmesan sauce, tossed with tender fettuccine noodles.

name: Salad
description: A refreshing garden salad with a mix of greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light vinaigrette dressing.

name: Tacos
description: Authentic Mexican tacos with seasoned beef, fresh cilantro, diced onions, and a squeeze of lime.

name: Steak
description: Grilled to perfection, this tender and juicy steak is served with a side of garlic mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Golden-battered fish fillets served with crispy fries and a side of tangy tartar sauce.

name: Ice Cream
description: Rich and creamy vanilla ice cream topped with your choice of hot fudge, sprinkles, and a cherry on top.
